Articles.Content:
Hi. So i maked harrier and i only use 1 mod and it is QuizThech Aero Pack.

You can find it here ---->[https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/612/QuizTech%20Aero%20Pack](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/612/QuizTech%20Aero%20Pack)

I dont own the mod i just use it and if you want long fly time use infinite fuel hack in debug monitor.

Its very easy to controll and it havent got fuell so mhuch.

And here is my craft download link --->[http://www./download/c3e9y878eddbo5t/harrier_1_4](http://www./download/c3e9y878eddbo5t/harrier_1_4).

 And if you want little bit staple lower engine thurst to 80% in vtol engine not the back vtol engine just front and use sas.

picture [http://imgur.com/gallery/p5bCrfz/new](http://imgur.com/gallery/p5bCrfz/new)

Hi man !

I suggest you to ALWAYS add a picture in your thread (even a thumbnail ) PPL "clic" when they see something & "Don't Clic" without pics ! 

I don't use Imgur , but you can use the [imgUR /IMGUR] Becon to make a integrated album .

With time you make it easy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hey man, you can link imgur images by taking this part of the link 'p5bCrfz' and adding this, [ imgur ] [ /imgur ] put the imgur code inbetween and remove the spaces.

 MJ

Here, let me go ahead and embed that image for you:

 ![p5bCrfz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/p5bCrfz.jpg)

When you upload it to Imgur, you can right click and copy the image, then paste it into your post.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also, why is it so small? Normally screenshots taken in KSP are huge.
Welcome to the forum, joonaskati. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I would like to see a larger picture of your plane.
That running on an apple watch? Any chance of a larger picture?
